text: Charlotte Aagaard (born 1 December 1977) is a Danish former professional tennis player. Aagaard represented the Denmark Fed Cup team in a total of 16 ties, between 1995 and 2001. On the professional tour, Aagaard competed in ITF Circuit tournaments, winning six doubles titles. ==ITF finals== ===Singles: 5 (0–5)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
